spell.spellDescription: Increases a unit's movement rate by 1.
spell.spellHelpText: Fills the target unit with a holy purpose and increases the target unit's movement speed by one.

spell.spellDescription: Blesses the target's weapons, giving them a +1 to-hit bonus.
spell.spellHelpText: Blesses the target's weapons, allowing them to hit creatures which are immune to non-magical attacks and giving a +1 to-hit bonus in combat.

spell.spellDescription: Heals up to 5 hits of damage taken by the target unit.
spell.spellHelpText: Heals up to 5 hits of damage taken by the target unit.

spell.spellDescription: The target's defense is increased by 2.
spell.spellHelpText: The target unit's defense is increased by 2.

spell.spellDescription: Unrest is reduced by 1 in all of the casting wizard's cities as long as this spell is in effect, and their fame is also increased by +10.
spell.spellHelpText: Reduces the number of rebels by 1 in each of the casting wizard's cities as the spell is in effect. Also grants a +10 bonus to the fame of the casting wizard.

spell.spellDescription: Life creatures get a bonus in combat and Death creatures are penalized.
spell.spellHelpText:
Basks the entire battlefield in rays of holy light, increasing the attack, defense, and resistance of all creatures of life by 1.
At the same time, creatures of death lose 1 from their attack, defense, and resistance.
True Light and Darkness negate the effects of one another.

spell.spellDescription: Summons a guardian spirit that can meld with nodes to generate magic power.
spell.spellHelpText:
Summons a Guardian Spirit which can meld with a node to focus its power and direct it to the controlling wizard.
A melded node radiates a magic aura the color of the wizard's banner.

spell.spellDescription: The target unit becomes elite.
spell.spellHelpText:
The target unit becomes elite.
This spell is automatically dispelled when the unit gains enough experience to becomes elite naturally.

spell.spellDescription: Endows the target unit with Immunity to Illusions.
spell.spellHelpText: Endows a target unit with the gift of Immunity to Illusions and allows the unit to see through Wall of Darkness.

spell.spellDescription: Shifts a stack of friendly units to the other plane.
spell.spellHelpText:
All friendly units within the target map square are transported to the other plane of existence.
If the unit is transported to an area which cannot normally entered by movement or into combat, the spell fails.

spell.spellDescription: Returns a hero that died in your service to life.
spell.spellHelpText:
Resurrects a hero from the dead, regardless of the length of time he or she has been dead.
The hero reappears at the wizard's summoning circle and is fully healed.
If six other heros have already been hired the spell fails.

spell.spellDescription: Attempts to destroy a Death or Chaos creature.
spell.spellHelpText:
Each chaos or death creature within the target group must resist at -4 or be destroyed by the holy fires.
Undead units suffer an additional -5 penalty.

spell.spellDescription: Prevents all travel across planes.
spell.spellHelpText:
Closes the junctions between the planes, sealing Arcanus from Myrror.
No unit can travel between the planes by Plane Shift, Planar Travel, Astral Gates or through towers of wizardry.

spell.spellDescription: Summons a herd of unicorns. These lovely creatures can teleport to any square on the battlefield.
spell.spellHelpText:
Calls a herd of magic unicorns.
These lovely creatures can teleport to any location on the battlefield and inspire their allies to with an increased ability to resist the effects of negative spells.

spell.spellDescription: Returns a unit that has just been killed in combat to life.
spell.spellHelpText:
Raises a fallen unit from the dead.
The unit returns with half its normal creatures. All enchantments cast on the unit are lost.
The spell does not work on summoned creatures, since they go back to their home world when slain.

spell.spellDescription: Allows the target unit to shift freely between the planes.
spell.spellHelpText:
Allows a target unit to shift between Arcanus and Myrror at will.
Note that units may not move into 'illegal' terrain types or initiate combat by Planar Travel.

spell.spellDescription: Calls forth the light of the heavens to shower the city in True Light.
spell.spellHelpText:
Calls forth the light of the heavens to shower the city in holy light.
Any combat taking place within the area of the city is treated as if True Light was in effect.

spell.spellDescription: Increases all rolls by all friendly units by 1.
spell.spellHelpText: Adds 1 to all rolls by all friendly units, including resistance rolls, attacks to hit, and defence rolls.

spell.spellDescription: Adds 3 to a targets attack strength, hits, and resistance.
spell.spellHelpText: Adds 3 to the target unit's attack strength, hits, and resistance.

spell.spellDescription: Summons the powerful hero Torin the Chosen.
spell.spellHelpText:
Summons Torin the Chosen to aid your cause.
There is only one Chosen for each wizard. If he is killed or disbanded and summoned again he retains all experience from his previous incarnations.

spell.spellDescription: The target becomes resistant to non-magical attacks and reduces all damage taken by 2.
spell.spellHelpText: Target unit is resistant to damage from non-magical attacks, and the first two hits sustained by the unit from any attack are ignored.

spell.spellDescription: Gives a target unit almost complete immunity to Chaos and Death magic.
spell.spellHelpText: Gives a target unit a tremendous sense of holy purpose, which calls so strongly upon the forces of life that they manifest themselves in the unit, providing it with complete immunity to all death and chaos magic spells and spell effects.

spell.spellDescription: Increase the gold obtained by a city by 50%.
spell.spellHelpText: Increases the gold obtained from the target city by 50% as long as the enchantment is in effect.

spell.spellDescription: All units built in the target city are Elite.
spell.spellHelpText: All units built in the target city are Elite.

spell.spellDescription: Summons an angel. Friendly units are strengthened by the presence of an angel.
spell.spellHelpText:
Summons an angel.
Angels enhance the fighting ability of friendly units and their touch Dispels Evil.

spell.spellDescription: Turns the target city into a fertile utopia.
spell.spellHelpText:
Turns an ordinary friendly city into a fertile utopia.
Population growth rates double and all units in the city heal completely at the end of every game turn.
The citizens are so pleased that unrest completely disappears.

spell.spellDescription: Heals all units involved in a battle for 5 hit points of damage.
spell.spellHelpText: Heals all friendly units for 5 hit points (or less, if a unit has sustained fewer than 5 hit points of damage).

spell.spellDescription: Attempts to banish all enemy summoned creatures from a battle.
spell.spellHelpText:
Attempts to banish outright all summoned and/or undead creatures (whether Animated or Black Channeled).
Each figure within each enemy unit must resist this holy utterance separately (at a penalty of 2 to resistance).
Undead have a much more difficult time resisting Holy Word than do other creatures.

spell.spellDescription: All friendly units fighting abilities are greatly increased.
spell.spellHelpText: Calls upon the forces of holiness and light to make all friendly units fight and defend exceptionally well: attack strengths (swords), ability to hit, and defense (shields) all increase by 2, while resistance (crosses) increases by 3 and the ability to block an attack and to hit increases by 10%.

spell.spellDescription: Instills a sense of purpose into the local citizenry; that city's production rate rises by 50%.
spell.spellHelpText: Instills a sense of greater purpose into the local citizenry; that city's production rate rises by 50%.

spell.spellDescription: Generates a portal in the target city that allows travel to the other plane.
spell.spellHelpText:
Generates a portal in a target city that allows travel to the other plane.
This spell only works as long as the portal does not lead directly to another city on the other world.
If the portal leads to stationed enemy troops, movement through the Astral Gate is blocked.

spell.spellDescription: All normal unit's weapons become holy, giving them a +1 to-hit bonus.
spell.spellHelpText: All normal units' weapons are blessed with a +1 attack bonus and can strike creatures immune to non-magical attacks.

spell.spellDescription: Completely protects a city from all Chaos and Death enchantments.
spell.spellHelpText: Dispels all negative enchantments on a city and protects the city from further chaos and death enchantments (whether city-specific or global).

spell.spellDescription: All Death spells must resist as they are being cast or be dispelled.
spell.spellHelpText: All non-combat death spells cast must resist against Life Force as if a Dispel Magic of 500 strength had been cast.

spell.spellDescription: All Chaos spells must resist as they are being cast or be dispelled.
spell.spellHelpText: Tries to prevent all chaos magic spells, requiring them to resist the forces of life as if a strong Disjunction of strength 500 had just been cast.

spell.spellDescription: Raises the level of all normal units controlled by the caster by 1.
spell.spellHelpText:
Inspires all of a wizard's normal units so that their levels all raise by one (recruit become regulars, regulars become veterans, etc.).
This allows units to attain the left of Ultra-Elite, or Champion if the casting wizard also has the Walord retort.

spell.spellDescription: Summons the awe-inspiring archangel. Archangels are powerful Life mages.
spell.spellHelpText:
Summons an archangel. Archangels can cast up to 40 mana in life magic spells every battle.
They are also immune to illusions, and inspire friendly units to fight better than normal

spell.spellDescription: Increases the hit points of all friendly units by 25%.
spell.spellHelpText:
Adds 25% of total hit points (with a minimum of one hit point added) to the hit points of each of a wizard's creatures.
Yes, that means every individual figure in every single unit!

spell.spellDescription: Summons a group of skeletons that are almost impossible to damage with arrows.
spell.spellHelpText:
Summons a group of 6 skeletons and binds them to the will of the wizard.
Skeletons have missile immunity.

spell.spellDescription: Reduces target unit's melee strength by 2.
spell.spellHelpText: Saps the strength from a target unit's creatures, who suffer a penalty of 2 to their melee, thrown and ranged attack strengths, unless the unit resists.

spell.spellDescription: Doubles power received from shrines, temples, etc. Reduces city growth by 25%.
spell.spellHelpText:
Generates a frenzy of sacrificing to the gods of death, which doubles the magic power obtained from shrines, temples, parthenons and cathedrals.
However, the rituals reduce the city population growth by 25% and increase the level of unrest by one.

spell.spellDescription: Enemy units must resist or they may not attack protected unit.
spell.spellHelpText:
Surrounds the target unit with a fear-inspiring aura.
Any time enemy units attempt to engage in melee combat with the cloaked unit they must first try to overcome their fright (on a per figure basis) before they can attack or counterattack.

spell.spellDescription: Target falls into a deep enchanted sleep, taking no action for the rest of the combat.
spell.spellHelpText:
Attempts to put a unit into a deep sleep so it is unable to take any actions for the rest of the combat.
Any attacks on the unit automatically do maximum damage (i.e. its shields are reduced to zero).

spell.spellDescription: Summons a pack of ghouls. Any unit slain by ghouls may rise up as undead creatures.
spell.spellHelpText:
Summons a pack of ghouls and binds them to the will of the wizard.
Any units slain mostly by the ghouls arise after the battle to serve the wizard in his undead army.

spell.spellDescription: Target loses one hit point for every point resistance roll is failed. -1 to roll for 5 mana.
spell.spellHelpText:
Siphons life from a target unit and gives it to a spell caster hero or converts the drained life into mana for a spell caster wizard.
Additional mana makes the spell harder to resist.
Units destroyed mainly by Life Drain become Undead under the caster's control.

spell.spellDescription: Every enemy unit must resist or do nothing each combat turn.
spell.spellHelpText:
Casts a pall of fear on all enemy units.
During every combat turn, each enemy unit must attempt (at +1 bonus to resistance) to overcome the terror that grips it, or cower in fear.
When a unit is cowering it cannot attack; however, the unit can still counterattack when it is defending against melee attacks initiated by the enemy.

spell.spellDescription: Death creatures get a bonus in combat and Life creatures are penalized.
spell.spellHelpText:
Drapes a shroud of darkness over the entire battlefield inspiring creatures of death who gain one point each in attack strength (swords), defense (shields) and resistance (crosses).
Creatures of life, on the other hand, are dispirited and lose one point each in attack strength, defense and resistance.

spell.spellDescription: Opponent wizard and spell casting heroes are drained of power during combat.
spell.spellHelpText:
All enemy spell casters are drained 5 mana each combat turn.
This includes the opponent wizard you are currently battling.
Additionally, all units with magical ranged attacks lose one spell shot each turn.

spell.spellDescription: Opponent wizard is drained of mana in overland.
spell.spellHelpText: Drains 50-150 mana points from a target wizard's mana reserve.

spell.spellDescription: Enemy normal unit becomes yours for duration of combat. Unit is destroyed after combat.
spell.spellHelpText:
Attempts to change the allegiance of a normal enemy unit to that of the casting wizard.
If the target unit becomes possessed, it fights for the casting wizard until combat ends and is then destroyed.
Note that summoned creatures and heroes may not be possessed.

spell.spellDescription: Normal unit is 'cursed' with lycanthropy and becomes werewolves.
spell.spellHelpText: 'Curses' a normal unit with the effects of lycanthropy, changing them into werewolves with the ability to regenerate and weapon immunity.

spell.spellDescription: All enemy unit's attacks, defense and resistance is reduced.
spell.spellHelpText: The attack strength and defense of all enemy units is reduced by 1 and their resistance is reduced by 2.

spell.spellDescription: Target unit becomes undead and receives a bonus to attack, defense, resistance and hit points.
spell.spellHelpText:
Transforms a target creature into a vile undead being with +2 melee attack strength, +1 to missile attack strength, breath attacks, hit points, resistance and defense.
Undead can not be healed or animated, but gain all the immunities of Death creatures.

spell.spellDescription: Summons an invisible night stalker.
spell.spellHelpText:
Summons a night stalker and binds it to the will of the wizard.
Night Stalkers are invisible, non-corporeal, and have the dreaded death gaze.

spell.spellDescription: Reduces diplomatic relations of all wizards in contact with target wizard.
spell.spellHelpText: Creates a feeling of contempt for the target wizard in all other wizards, reducing relations by 25 diplomatic points.

spell.spellDescription: Blocks ranged attacks from outside of wall to inside of wall.
spell.spellHelpText: No enemy unit outside a Wall of Darkness may attack a friendly unit inside with a ranged attack, unless the enemy unit has illusions immunity.

spell.spellDescription: Doubles melee attack strength and reduces defense to 0.
spell.spellHelpText: The target unit's melee attack strength is doubled and its defense is reduced to 0.

spell.spellDescription: Summons a group of shadow demons that can plane shift and regenerate.
spell.spellHelpText:
Summons a group of 4 shadow demons and binds them to the will of the wizard.
Shadow demons can plane shift and regenerate.

spell.spellDescription: Target unit becomes non-corporeal.
spell.spellHelpText:
Target unit becomes non-corporeal.
Non-corporeal units gain weapon immunity and the ability to move across any terrain at a cost of ½ movement point.

spell.spellDescription: Each enemy figure must resist every turn of combat or take 1 point of damage.
spell.spellHelpText:
Wracks all enemy non-death creatures with the powers of darkness.
Each figure in every enemy unit must resist with a +1 bonus or take 1 point of damage.

spell.spellDescription: Eliminates all power received from shrines, temples, etc. in target city.
spell.spellHelpText:
A demonic presence enters the target city, destroying any magic power generated by shrines, temples, parthenons, and cathedrals.
The spell has no effect if the city's owner can use death magic.

spell.spellDescription: Summons a group of non-corporeal life-stealing wraiths.
spell.spellHelpText:
Summons a group of 4 wraiths and binds them to the will of the wizard.
Wraiths are non-corporeal and have a -3 resistance life-stealing attack.

spell.spellDescription: All combats at target city are under the effects of Darkness.
spell.spellHelpText:
Summons a great cloud of shadow which surrounds the city as long as the enchantment is in effect.
All combats taking place at the city are treated as though a Darkness spell has been cast.

spell.spellDescription: Node drains 5 mana from owning wizard instead of generating extra mana.
spell.spellHelpText:
Corrupts the targeted magic node, cursing the controller and drawing out 5 mana from the wizard instead of generating more.
Once warped, a node can only be returned to normal by a Disenchant Area or Disenchant True spell.
Until then the node will continue to draw out magical power.

spell.spellDescription: All figures in every unit in target overland map square must resist or die.
spell.spellHelpText: All figures in each unit within the targeted land must resist at -1 or rot away from a vile degenerative disease that slays almost immediately.

spell.spellDescription: All normal units slain in combat are transformed into zombies under your control.
spell.spellHelpText: All normal creatures falling in battle become zombies at the end of the battle under the control of the casting wizard if that wizard is victorious.

spell.spellDescription: Halves food produced in a city.
spell.spellHelpText:
Halves the food production of the afflicted city as long as the famine is in effect.
If the city has an insufficient food supply, the citizens will begin to starve.

spell.spellDescription: Halves production in a city.
spell.spellHelpText: Halves the production of a city.

spell.spellDescription: Target wizard loses 1-10 % of casting skill permanently.
spell.spellHelpText: Target wizard loses 1-10% of spell casting skill permanently.

spell.spellDescription: Each figure in target unit must resist at -5 or be slain.
spell.spellHelpText: Each figure in one unit must save at -5 or be slain instantly.

spell.spellDescription: Summons a squad of terrifying death knights.
spell.spellHelpText:
Summons a group of 4 death knights and binds them to the will of the wizard.
Death Knights attack with +2 to-hit, armour piercing and first strike.
They also have a -4 resistance life-stealing attack.

spell.spellDescription: All figures in every enemy unit in combat must resist or die.
spell.spellHelpText: All figures in every enemy unit must resist at -2 or be struck dead where they stand.

spell.spellDescription: Animates a dead enemy or ally unit in combat.
spell.spellHelpText:
Raises one slain enemy (not protected by magic immunity) or ally unit from the dead and places it under your control.
The creature becomes undead, and is treated as a creature of death for all purposes.
Animated summoned units cost 50% more in maintenance.

spell.spellDescription: City population is reduced by 1,000 if its population exceeds a (1-10 roll) x1000.
spell.spellHelpText: Spreads a deadly plague throughout the affected city killing 1,000 population each turn if the current population exceeds a (1-10 roll) x1000.

spell.spellDescription: All combats are under the effects of a Darkness spell.
spell.spellHelpText:
Covers the world in a blanket of darkness.
Except for those cities protected by Heavenly Light, all combats are assumed to be covered by the spell of Darkness.

spell.spellDescription: All Nature and Life spell's casting cost is increased by 50%.
spell.spellHelpText: All nature and life spells cost 50% more than normal to cast.

spell.spellDescription: All normal units on both planes must resist or die.
spell.spellHelpText: All enemy normal units on both planes must resist or be slain.

spell.spellDescription: Summons a demon lord that can call 3 more lesser demons to fight in combat.
spell.spellHelpText:
Summons a demon lord and binds it to the will of the wizard.
Demon lords can summon up to 3 lesser demons per combat, have weapon immunity, and have a -1 resistance life-stealing attack both in melee and at range.

spell.spellDescription: Summons magic spirit to meld with nodes and generate magic power.
spell.spellHelpText: Summons a magic spirit which can meld with magical nodes and direct the node's power to the controlling wizard.

spell.spellDescription: Dispels enemy spells on one unit in combat.
spell.spellHelpText:
Attempts to destroy all enemy enchantments on a unit.
The chance for success is equal to the mana spent on this spell divided by the sum of the costs for this spell and the target enchantment.
For example if this spell is cast with 30 mana on a unit with an Eldritch Weapon enchantment (cost 15) the chance to dispel it would be 30/(30+15) or 67%.

spell.spellDescription: Moves the location of your Summoning Circle to another city.
spell.spellHelpText:
Moves your summoning circle to another city.
All creatures summoned by spells will appear in this new city.

spell.spellDescription: Dispels all enemy spells in the target map square.
spell.spellHelpText:
Attempts to dispel all enemy spells in the targeted map square.
The chance of successfully dispelling an enchantment is calculated as in Dispel Magic.

spell.spellDescription: Removes a friendly hero from combat and returns her to your summoning circle.
spell.spellHelpText: Instantly summons the target hero to your summoning circle, removing her from the current combat.

spell.spellDescription: Reveals the spell currently being cast by opponent wizards.
spell.spellHelpText: The current spell being cast by all wizards that you are in contact with will be displayed on the Magic Screen at the top of each wizard's gem.

spell.spellDescription: Creates a lesser magical item for use by your heroes.
spell.spellHelpText:
Creates a lesser magical item for use by your heroes.
Only powers that cost 200 mana or less may be used.

spell.spellDescription: Summons a lesser hero to lead your army.
spell.spellHelpText:
Summons a lesser hero to lead your army.
The hero will not require any initial gold to join, but still requires maintenance.

spell.spellDescription: Reveals the location of all cities on both planes.
spell.spellHelpText: Reveals the location of all cities on both planes.

spell.spellDescription: Dispels a global enchantment.
spell.spellHelpText:
Attempts to dispel one enemy global enchantment.
The chance of successfully dispelling this enchantment is calculated as in Dispel Magic.

spell.spellDescription: Creates a magical artifact for use by your heroes.
spell.spellHelpText:
Creates a magical artifact for use by your heroes.
Any powers may be used.

spell.spellDescription: Summons a greater hero to lead your army.
spell.spellHelpText:
Summons a greater hero to lead your army.
The hero will not require any initial gold to join, but still requires maintenance.

spell.spellDescription: Banishes all opponent wizards to Limbo. You win.
spell.spellHelpText:
Caster obtains total control of all magic in both planes.
Enemy wizards lose their ability to cast any spells and all summoned creatures come under your control.
Successfully casting the Spell of Mastery ends the game in a glorious victory for the caster.

spell.spellDescription: This spell enables a wizard to return if his fortress is captured.
spell.spellHelpText:
When your enchanted fortress is captured by an enemy you are banished to Limbo until you finish casting the Spell of Return.
You may not cast any other spells while banished and you receive no magic power income.

citySpellEffect.citySpellEffectHelpText: Extends the scouting range of a friendly target city to 4 squares in any direction, revealing all lands and all non-invisible enemy troops within that radius.

A target city's maximum food harvest increases by 50%.
Every turn there is a 10% chance the city's deserts convert to grasslands and volcanoes to verdant hills, and a 20% chance that its corrupted lands return to their pristine state.

Creates a teleporting device within a target city.
Friendly units can teleport between any two of the casting wizard's cities equipped with earth gates, for the cost of one movement point.
Provides total immunity for the city from Life spells and prohibits any summoned creatures of Life from entering the protected city.
Provides total immunity for the city from Death spells and prohibits any summoned creatures of Death from entering the protected city.
Provides total immunity for the city from Chaos spells and prohibits any summoned creatures of Chaos from entering the protected city.
Provides total immunity for the city from Nature spells and prohibits any summoned creatures of Nature from entering the protected city.
Provides total immunity for the city from Sorcery spells and prohibits any summoned creatures of Sorcery from entering the protected city.

Encircles a city with a protective wall of flames.
Each figure of any non-flying unit that attempts to pass through suffers a 5 strength magical fire attack.
Ranged attacks are not affected.

Opens a great magical vortex over an enemy city.
Each turn, units inside the city sustain five strength 8 Lightning Bolt attacks, and there is a 5% chance of a building being destroyed.

Calls forth the light of the heavens to shower the city in holy light.
Any combat taking place within the area of the city is treated as if True Light was in effect.
Increases the gold obtained from the target city by 50% as long as the enchantment is in effect.
All units built in the target city are Elite.

Turns an ordinary friendly city into a fertile utopia.
Population growth rates double and all units in the city heal completely at the end of every game turn.
The citizens are so pleased that unrest completely disappears.
Instills a sense of greater purpose into the local citizenry; that city's production rate rises by 50%.

Generates a portal in a target city that allows travel to the other plane.
This spell only works as long as the portal does not lead directly to another city on the other world.
If the portal leads to stationed enemy troops, movement through the Astral Gate is blocked.
Dispels all negative enchantments on a city and protects the city from further chaos and death enchantments (whether city-specific or global).

Generates a frenzy of sacrificing to the gods of death, which doubles the magic power obtained from shrines, temples, parthenons and cathedrals.
However, the rituals reduce the city population growth by 25% and increase the level of unrest by one.
No enemy unit outside a Wall of Darkness may attack a friendly unit inside with a ranged attack, unless the enemy unit has illusions immunity.

A demonic presence enters the target city, destroying any magic power generated by shrines, temples, parthenons, and cathedrals.
The spell has no effect if the city's owner can use death magic.

Summons a great cloud of shadow which surrounds the city as long as the enchantment is in effect.
All combats taking place at the city are treated as though a Darkness spell has been cast.

Halves the food production of the afflicted city as long as the famine is in effect.
If the city has an insufficient food supply, the citizens will begin to starve.
Halves the production of a city.
Spreads a deadly plague throughout the affected city killing 1,000 population each turn if the current population exceeds a (1-10 roll) x1000.

ATTACKER_NAME making ATTACK_TYPE attack - Attack strength ATTACK_STRENGTH x ATTACKER_FIGURES figures = potential POTENTIAL_DAMAGE damage x CHANCE_TO_HIT% chance to hit = average AVERAGE_DAMAGE damage - Actual damage = ACTUAL_DAMAGE

DEFENDER_NAME taking ACTUAL_DAMAGE hits - Each of DEFENDER_FIGURES figures has defence DEFENCE_STRENGTH x CHANCE_TO_DEFEND% chance to block = average AVERAGE_BLOCK hits blocked - Actual hits blocked by each figure = ACTUAL_BLOCK
ATTACKER_NAME making Melee attack against DEFENDER_NAME with simultaneous counterattack
ATTACKER_NAME making Ranged attack against DEFENDER_NAME with no counterattack
Base growth rate = ((MAXIMUM_POPULATION_DIV_1000 - CURRENT_POPULATION_DIV_1000 + 1) / 2 rounding up) x10 = BASE_GROWTH_RATE people per turn
Racial Growth Modifier = RACIAL_GROWTH_MODIFIER people per turn
BUILDING_NAME increases growth by BUILDING_GROWTH_MODIFIER people per turn
But this would go over maximum population, so reduced to CAPPED_GROWTH_RATE people per turn
Population dying at rate of BASE_DEATH_RATE x50 = CITY_DEATH_RATE per turn
NUMBER_DOING_TASK TASK_NAME_PLURAL each producing PRODUCTION_PER_TASK PRODUCTION_TYPE = PRODUCTION_ALL_PEOPLE_DOING_TASK PRODUCTION_TYPE
APPLICABLE_POPULATION population each paying PRODUCTION_PER_PERSON PRODUCTION_TYPE in taxes = PRODUCTION_ALL_PEOPLE PRODUCTION_TYPE
TILE_COUNT TILE_TYPE tiles each producing PRODUCTION_PER_TILE PRODUCTION_TYPE = PRODUCTION_ALL_TILES PRODUCTION_TYPE
MAP_FEATURE_COUNT MAP_FEATURE each producing PRODUCTION_PER_MAP_FEATURE PRODUCTION_TYPE = PRODUCTION_ALL_MAP_FEATURES PRODUCTION_TYPE
BUILDING_NAME produces BUILDING_UNMODIFIED_PRODUCTION PRODUCTION_TYPE +RELIGIOUS_PERCENTAGE_BONUS% bonus from RETORT_LIST = BUILDING_MODIFIED_PRODUCTION PRODUCTION_TYPE
FORTRESS_NAME produces PRODUCTION_PER_PICK PRODUCTION_TYPE for each PICK_TYPE xPICK_COUNT= PRODUCTION_ALL_PICKS PRODUCTION_TYPE
FORTRESS_NAME being on PLANE_NAME produces FORTRESS_PLANE_PRODUCTION PRODUCTION_TYPE
TILE_COUNT TILE_TYPE each gives PERCENTAGE_PER_TILE% PRODUCTION_TYPE bonus = PERCENTAGE_ALL_TILES% PRODUCTION_TYPE bonus
GOLD_TRADE_BONUS_TILE_TYPE% gold trade bonus from river/ocean
GOLD_TRADE_BONUS_ROADS% gold trade bonus from direct road connections to other cities
GOLD_TRADE_BONUS_RACE% gold trade bonus from race
However trade bonus is capped at CURRENT_POPULATION_DIV_1000 x 3% = GOLD_TRADE_BONUS_CAPPED%
PERCENTAGE_BONUS% of ROUNDED_PRODUCTION_AMOUNT = PRODUCTION_AMOUNT_FROM_PERCENTAGE_BONUS for a total of PRODUCTION_TOTAL
However value is capped at PRODUCTION_CAPPED
APPLICABLE_POPULATION population each eating CONSUMPTION_PER_PERSON PRODUCTION_TYPE = CONSUMPTION_ALL_PEOPLE PRODUCTION_TYPE
BUILDING_NAME has maintenance of BUILDING_CONSUMPTION PRODUCTION_TYPE
Net gain of PRODUCTION_CAPPED - CONSUMPTION_AMOUNT = NET_GAIN
Net loss of CONSUMPTION_AMOUNT - PRODUCTION_CAPPED = NET_LOSS
TAX_PERCENTAGE% unrest caused by tax rate
RACE_PERCENTAGE% unrest caused by distrust between capital and city races
CURRENT_POPULATION_DIV_1000 population x TOTAL_PERCENTAGE% = BASE_UNREST rebels
RACE_LITERAL from capital and city races
RELIGIOUS_BUILDING_REDUCTION from religious buildings x RETORT_PERCENTAGE% bonus from RETORT_LIST = RETORT_VALUE
UNIT_REDUCTION from UNIT_COUNT non-summoned units stationed in city
However cannot be negative, so set to zero
However cannot be greater than the population of the city, so set to CURRENT_POPULATION_DIV_1000
However must have MINIMUM_FARMERS farmers, so rebels reduced to TOTAL_AFTER_FARMERS
